Package org.jvault.factory

Class ClassVaultFactory

java.lang.Object
org.jvault.factory.ClassVaultFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
VaultFactory<ClassVault>
public final class ClassVaultFactory extends Object implements VaultFactory<ClassVault>
receives VaultFactoryBuildInfo or String (the name of the Vault if the Vault already exists) value as an input,
and returns ClassVault.
Since:
0.1

  • ClassVault

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static ClassVaultFactory getInstance()
      The ClassVault Factory is managed by Singleton, and all constructors are private, so execute this method to obtain the ClassVaultFactory.
      Returns:
      ClassVaultFactory

    • get

      public ClassVault get(String vaultName) throws IllegalStateException
      Description copied from interface: VaultFactory
      Returns the Vault interface implementation class by receiving the VaultName.
      This method is not to create a new vault, but to return the existing vault corresponding to the vaultName.
      If the vaultName does not have a corresponding vault, throw IllegalStateException.
      Specified by:
      get in interface VaultFactory<ClassVault>
      Parameters:
      vaultName - The name of the vault to be returned.
      Returns:
      ClassVault that implementation type of the Vault

      interface.

      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - Throw IllegalStateException if the corresponding vault does not exist for the vaultName.
      Since:
      0.1

    • get

      public ClassVault get(VaultFactoryBuildInfo buildInfo)
      Description copied from interface: VaultFactory
      Returns the Vault interface implementation class by receiving the VaultFactoryBuildInfo.
      Vault Factory creates a new Vault based on VaultFactoryInfo.
      If a vault with the name corresponding to "VaultFactoryBuildInfo.getVaultName()" already exists, the vault is returned.
      Specified by:
      get in interface VaultFactory<ClassVault>
      Parameters:
      buildInfo - The collection of information that VaultFactory needs to create Vault.
      Returns:
      ClassVault that implementation type of the Vault

      interface.

      Since:
      0.1
      See Also:
      • VaultFactoryBuildInfo
